title: Haven't gotten a key fragment in the last 11 days.
body:
I'm pretty sure the last key fragment I proced was on the 13th, but it's been 11 days since then and I'm still not able to forge a key to open the newest chest I got. I thought we get 3 per week?

Did I cap super early this month?

replies.body:
Same here, me and 4 of my friends haven't gotten a single fragment like 10 days minimum
even before that they rarely dropped, while one of my friends got like 9 fragments in a week, I got 2 (we played roughly the same amount of matches)
I'm honor 4 btw which makes things even weirder since they are supposed to drop more often
no, there's no difference between honor 3,4 and 5. the only difference between 3 and 2 is that 3 has honor capsules. There're only 12 keys per month on each honor lvl higher and equal than 2

huh didn't know that
but still I'm pretty sure I didn't get 12 in the past month, I usually got maybe 2 per week and I got 3 in a capsule but I haven't gotten anything for like 2 weeks (if anyone could check cause I don't remember fully tbh it would be great)

Just to clarify, there isn't a guaranteed number of keys you get per week!  You are still capped at earning 12 keys in a single month, which it does seem like you hit!  You have earned 12 fragments within the past rolling 30 days.  You should be able to earn one in the near future however, so keep playing and keep an eye out!

Hopefully this info helps a bit ^.^  Let me know if you have any further questions!
